Elizabeth Griffin was born on 5-Jul-1775 at Camden District, South Carolina. She was the daughter of Ralph Griffin and Catherine Munson. Elizabeth married Aaron Van Cleave, son of John Van Cleave Sr. and Mary Shepherd, on 2-Jun-1791 at Jefferson later was Shelby, Kentucky. Elizabeth Griffin died on 20-Sep-1834 at Montgomery County, Indiana, at age 59.
